title: My Daily Phrase German - Becoming a Member
description: This is a special edition of My Daily Phrase German which will talk you through signing up to become a premium member. You're advised to listen to this edition by your computer. Mark from Radio Lingua will talk you through the process of signing up for premium membership.
content:encoded: This is a special edition of My Daily Phrase German which will talk you through signing up to become a premium member. You're advised to listen to this edition by your computer. Mark from Radio Lingua will talk you through the process of signing up for premium membership.
itunes:subtitle: Help for signing up to become a Premium Member
